about_the_game:
Backyard Boxing

Is a gritty, immersive urban boxing experience where your rise to the top of an illegal boxing league is paved with blood, sweat, and street smarts. Developed by a solo creator, this game puts you in the shoes of an underdog fighter clawing their way out of the trenches, hustling through the underground circuit to become a street legend. From the moment you step into your first backyard ring, you’ll be on a relentless grind to prove yourself, gain respect, and conquer the underground league.

The Grind to Greatness

Start as a nobody in the brutal world of illegal backyard boxing, fighting for scraps and reputation. Earn your place through raw determination, cunning, and fists of steel. With each victory, you’ll gain fans, unlock new cities to showcase your talent, and climb the ranks of the league.

Key Features

"The drag racing system will be back very soon! We found a major game-breaking bug that needs to be fixed before re-enabling it. We appreciate your patience and will have it back in the game as soon as possible."

  • Raw, High-Stakes Boxing Action:

    • Face gritty, unpredictable opponents with unique fighting styles.

    • Unlock and upgrade fighters, refining their skills to dominate the competition.

  • A Dynamic Urban Experience:

    • Travel to New Cities: Expand your reach as you fight across different neighborhoods, building a fanbase and leaving your mark.

    • Gain Fans: Win matches and take risks to grow your following and reputation.

  • Street Hustle Mechanics:

    • Drug Dealing: Make fast cash in the dangerous underworld, but every deal has its risks.

    • Gambling and Betting: Wager your hard-earned money on fights, races, and more to multiply your fortune—or lose it all.

    • Loan Sharks: Need cash fast? Borrow to stay afloat, but beware of failing to pay back in time.

    Mini-Games and Side Activities:

    • Spin daily wheels, scratch tickets, and encounter random events that can either boost your progress or throw a wrench in your plans.

    • Training for Skill Points

      • Access the Training Tab to grind for skill points.

      • Use skill points to upgrade key attributes like:

        • Speed: Land faster punches and dodge with precision.

        • Power: Deliver heavier hits to break down opponents.

        • Health: Stay in the fight longer by absorbing more damage.

  • Blackjack and Gambling: Hit underground tables to play blackjack, placing high-stakes bets to boost your cash—or walk away empty-handed.

    🏆 Online Leaderboards 📊

    It’s all about who’s got the most fans! 🏅 Win fights, build your name, and climb the leaderboards by gaining the most fans. 📈 The more hype you generate, the higher you rank—only the real backyard legends make it to the top! 🔥🥊

  • Wins and Losses Tracking:

    • Your record speaks for itself—track your victories and defeats as you carve out your legacy.

  • The Schedule System:

    • Every decision matters in this time-sensitive world. Balance training, fighting, hustling, and resting to stay on top without burning out.

  • Ultimate Goal:

    • Fight your way through the underground league, facing the toughest fighters across different cities. Defeat them all to claim the title of the ultimate champion.

content_descriptors.notes: Tru or Die Presents: Backyard Boxing contains mature themes and depictions of illegal activities, including the use and sale of drugs, underground betting, and unregulated gambling. The game explores the dangerous world of money laundering and high-stakes, unsanctioned street racing. Additionally, the story features graphic depictions of illegal boxing clubs where brutal, no-holds-barred fights take place for profit and notoriety. These elements are intended to portray the harsh realities of an underground lifestyle and may not be suitable for all audiences. Viewer discretion is advised.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor (3.5 GHz or faster)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080, AMD Radeon RX Vega 64, Or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (or newer)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K, AMD Ryzen 7 3700X, or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070, AMD Radeon RX 6800, or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
